subject: Order #SSN4704 Loadcell issue
description_text:
Hi team,

I ordered my pedals on Dec 11 with express shipping but was delivered after
11 days (today) and now I just set it up and plugged it in the computer and
the load cell seems to have issues
It’s very frustrating when the delivery gets delayed even after paying for
express delivery (Note: it’s not UPS fault for the delay the item itself
was dispatched only after 7th day) and now the pedals are faulty.
Not sure why I have spend £200 for

Even without touching the pedal there is load being applied in the pedal
I double checked and nothing is touching or not even near the pedal

What do I do now ?

conversations.body_text: Hi NIJOHN JM,    You can set the Offset, which will reset the pedal’s initial signal to 0%. After setting the offset, please recalibrate the pedal. The blue signal is the one used by the game, and a dead zone can be configured for it.

This is the maximum force I am gonna put and I want my pedal to range from
0 to 100 inbetween this point
How do I set that

I have attached a video please check

On Mon, 22 Dec 2025 at 23:00, service@simsonn.com
Hi NIJOHN JM,     Please use the Calibrate button shown in the screenshot to calibrate the pedal signal. After calibration, you will be able to press the pedal from 0% to 100%.
